entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 10:10 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
